import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { Container, AppBar, Typography, Grow, Grid } from '@material-ui/core' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import {getPosts} from './actions/posts' import Posts from './components/Posts/Posts' import Form from './components/Form/Form' import useStyles from './styles' import camera from './images/camera.jpg' const App = () => { const [currentId, setCurrentId] = useState(null) const classes = useStyles() const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getPosts); }, [dispatch]) return( Recollection
) } export default App;
